about_the_game:
This is a prequel for My New Memories. You don't have to have played the main game to understand the story.

Experience the story of the Main Character before he reunited with the love of his life - Anna. Meet characters you will also meet in the main game and experience how the MC went through university to eventually become the best architect in his city! Reunite with Bethany ( your mother ) and Sabrina ( your twin-sister ) and see how those relationships developed over time!

During your time at the university you will experience love and lust for the first time. What special relationship did you have with your twin sister even before you became more than just siblings? How did your feelings for your mother change over time? And who did you experience your first times with?

Meet the characters!

Sabrina ( name can be changed ) , your twin sister. Both of you start university at the same time and as usual, you two are very close. She was there for you when you experienced the biggest loss in your life and knows exactly how you feel. But there is more between you and her than just the love of siblings...

Bethany ( name can be changed ), your mother. She had to raise you and your sisters on her own ever since your parents divorced. She does everything for her children and is always happy to have a talk with you about anything. But it also seems the interest in each other grew a little more intense ever since you entered adulthood

Lea, one of your best childhood friends. She lives next door with her mother, Katharina, and has basically become part of your family by now. She was there when Anna and her family had to leave and she was also very close with them. While you two jokingly flirted with each other over the years, starting university has certainly intensified this. Maybe it's time you two become more than friends...

Katharina, Lea's mother. She and your mother have become very good friends and they basically see each other every day. You always had a huge crush on her but never had the confidence to act on it. Now that you are going to university you noticed that her looks also changed. Katharina knows what she wants and if you decide to let her, she can become the woman you always desired.

Jackie, your best friend. You two were basically the troublemakers of the neighborhood for most of your time as children. She is like another sister to you, but sometimes even closer than that. Recently she found something out about her family that turned her life upside down, something she told only you about. She also goes to the same university you, Sabrina and Lea go to, so there is plenty of time to catch up because she was gone for quite some time...

Rei, an exchange student from Japan. You will meet her on your first day in the university and immediately take an interest in her - Something that is very mutual. Something as simple as showing her the mall in your city can quickly turn out to be a love story you have never seen before. It's like you two just click...A completely new experience.

Amelie, a student you meet at your university. Being bullied for most of her life because of her size, you quickly learn that she might look fragile, but verbally she is very active. You help her out during a very emotional situation which leads to you two becoming friends. Since men especially always bullied her it will take some time for her to fully trust you...

F.A.Q:
.

  • Why is there a prequel when the main game is still in early access? And the last update has been a while?
    Due to some personal things that happened that you can read up on the main game page, I was forced to shift my work from My New Memories to this prequel so I can keep honing my skills in rendering. The first playable version of the prequel gained a lot of positive feedback, so I decided to continue to work on it.

  • So once you can work on the main game again, will you abandon this version?
    Not until it's fully completed. So as long as I can't work on the main game, I will provide updates and introduce new characters.

  • Why is the game not free, then?
    My first decision was to make it free, but due to increasing legal fees because of the battle I'm fighting as of writing this store description, I decided to ask for a small price.

  • Will there ever be any paid DLCs or do I have to pay again for future updates?
    No. Every future update that I will release until I can fully return to the main game will always be free. There will never be any paid DLC for this game

This game is very story heavy, please keep that in mind before you buy it. It focuses more on the story than it does on the lewds. While there are lewd scenes in the game, they are not the focus.

  • A Story-Rich Visual Novel that includes character interactions, development and extremely wholesome moments

  • High quality images and animations

  • No game overs, no bad endings.

content_descriptors.notes:
This is an adult only NSFW game!
All characters are over 18 years old.
Contains sexual suggestive content, fully animated sex scenes and nudity of certain characters.
Contains non-glorified abuse ( not sexual ) and violence.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compatible Card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: My New Memories: The Beginning tells you the story of My New Memories before you reunited with Anna and started a family. Find out how the MC turned out to be the man you know from the main game - The loving and caring husband and the protective and wonderful father!
